name: Revenge of the Rudolians
description:
This is a test map to show the behaviors of the enemies of my game. They chase after you, climb walls, and have rag doll physics.

Enemies can only be slain with 3 strikes to the head.

Weapons break after a certain amount of collisions. Even if the weapon is held in your hand. 

I plan on redoing the melee combat and adding sounds in the future. 

----------------------------------

Controls 

Move - WASD

Look - Mouse

Pick Up Axe - E

Throw Axe - 3

Drop Axe - V

Reload Game - P
